讔字的基本解释

讔
yǐn
隐语。
应答之言。

讔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐn］
［《集韻》倚謹切，上隱，影。］
隐语。

讔字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　讔； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1187第15
【集韻】倚謹切，音隱。廋語也。【字彙】詶言也。　又【文心雕龍】讔者，隱也。遯辭以隱意，譎譬以指事也。【呂覽·重言篇】荆莊王立三年，不聽而好讔。　又【正字通】與隱通。【劉向·新序】齊宣王發隱書而讀之。隱卽讔字。　【字彙補】亦書作?。或作?，非。?字从阝，左右結構。

考證：〔【集韻】倚謹切，音隱。庾語也。〕　謹照原文庾語改廋語。
讔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
讔字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　讔; Kangxi strokes: 24; page number: page 1187 15
[Jiyun] Leaning and cutting, the sound is hidden. Lingyu also. 【Vocabulary】Ping Yan Ye.　[Wen Xin Diao Long] Eternal person, also hidden. Escape words are hidden meanings, and deceptive words are also used to refer to things. [Lu Lan·Tautou Articles] The king of Jingzhuang was established for three years, and he was silly without listening.　[Zhengzitong] and Yintong. 【Liu Xiang·New Preface】The King of Qi Xuan read it after publishing a hidden book. Hidden 卽讔 word.　【Word Supplement】Also book for?. Or for?, no. ? The word from Qian, left and right structure. Textual research: [[Jiyun] Leaning carefully, the sound is hidden. Yu Yu also. 〕　I would like to change the Yu language according to the original Yu Yu.
